title: Studio5 and FontMaster
content:
Dear typophiles,

I have purchased Studio5, and have also downloaded FontMaster Light. Are there any of you with experience using both of these tools? Is there anything in, especially, BezierMaster that is particularly useful in comparison? I have some experience with FontLab 3.0 (and FontForge) but I am basically new to both of these high-end tools.

Best  
Idris
author: ishamid
